title: Who Needs to be Nerf Hammered

embed.description: November bundles & mystery gifts up!] A new champion and skin sale starts tomorrow! Between November 20th and November 23rd , you'll be able to pick up Guardian of the Sands Kha'Zix for 487 RP, Pool Party Renekton for 487 RP, Northern Storm Volibear for 375 RP, Traditional Lee Sin for 260 RP, Zac for 487 RP, Vayne for 440 RP, Gangplank for 395 RP and Malphite for 292 RP.

body:
Srsly who needs to be nerfed voice your opinions

And should we remove silence?

replies.body:
Why should silence be removed?

It stops people like bronze complaining 24/7 because they don't know how to silence a kat while she is ulting and 95% of bronze don't know what a cc is.
Every time some idiot uses the word "stun" as a blanket term for any and all kinds of cc I throw up a little.

I didn't use 'stun' at all.

or are you just stating that?

They just have base abilities that make them strong or one button that makes them strong however because of the variety of teams they fit with/work with and the multitude of setups in League they rarely present themselves as overtly strong so there's not much you can do about it, but when it comes to being caught or dealing with them mid/late game they all represent problems respectively however because not only do they fit with different teams but they can be on opposing teams so it's basically irrelevant.
